repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was the gift of Gary Shrewsbury (donor no. 10047) and came to the library in 2008.

accruals.p: No further additions to the papers are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open; no duplication of the images is permitted except with the permission of the donor.

userestrict.p: Copyright is not held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Gary Shrewsbury photographs, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Gary Shrewsbury was a contract photographer during the gubernatorial administration of James J. Blanchard, 1983-1990.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of photographic negatives of Governor Blanchard while attending public functions, giving speeches, signing bills, and at various other meetings, receptions, political gatherings, and fund raisers.
